last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 7
last_episode_to_air.overview: Relive the boys' epic road trip with this look back at the most calamitous challenges and memorable moments of their series two adventure.

name: A League of Their Own US Road Trip
original_name: A League of Their Own US Road Trip
overview: Jamie Redknapp, Freddie Flintoff, Jack Whitehall and James Corden embark on a road trip across America where they'll compete with one another in various tasks and sports.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Mad cap mini series of UK sports TV show

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A League of Their Own boys Jamie, Jack and Freddie jet off to join superstar mate James Corden for a host of outrageous challenges in the ultimate US adventure.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The boys fight to avoid the final forfeit as their US challenges continue. Their friendship is tested when they fend for themselves in the forest.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The boys hit Las Vegas for three last chances to dodge dancing with the Chippendales. Who can guzzle their way to victory at the Heart Attack Grill?

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Unseen: Go behind the scenes of the boys' epic US adventure in a special episode featuring all the outtakes, pranks and wind-ups you were never meant to see.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Mad cap mini series of UK sports TV show

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Jamie, Jack and Freddie rejoin James Corden for second riotous road trip and a bigger, badder and bolder set of stateside challenges.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: James Corden and the boys shake their booties as cheerleaders. Plus, things get heated in a calamitous firefighting training session.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The fun continues as Jack, Jamie and Freddie go deep-sea fishing for sharks in Miami and crocodile hunting in Florida's Everglades.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Jack, Jamie and Freddie race across New York City, before auditioning for Disney musical Aladdin. Then, they face a Wall Street challenge.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Tune in for unseen footage from the lads' eventful US adventure. Featuring hilarious outtakes, pranks and behind-the-scenes antics.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Go behind the scenes of the boys' epic US adventure with a second helping of unseen footage.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Relive the boys' epic road trip with this look back at the most calamitous challenges and memorable moments of their series two adventure.
